summary.span: 指定要進行 WMI 連接所需的所有設定。

span.span: Specifies all settings required to make a WMI connection.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會連線到遠端電腦，並顯示遠端電腦上的作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連線到遠端電腦，並顯示遠端電腦上的作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A建立連線到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::AuthenticationLevel Authentication { System::Management::AuthenticationLevel get(); void set(System::Management::AuthenticationLevel value); };
member this.Authentication : System.Management.AuthenticationLevel with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 COM 驗證等級，以使用於這個連接中的作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection.

value.span: 傳回 列舉值，表示連接到本機或遠端電腦所使用的 COM 驗證等級。

span.span: Returns an enumeration value indicating the COM authentication level used for a connection to the local or a remote computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 2000 及之前的版本與 WMI 服務會要求連接層級驗證，而在 Windows XP 和更高版本，它會要求封包層級驗證。On Windows 2000 and below, the WMI service will request Connect level authentication, while on Windows XP and higher it will request Packet level authentication. 如果用戶端需要特定驗證設定，此屬性可用來控制這個特定連線的驗證層級。If the client requires a specific authentication setting, this property can be used to control the authentication level on this particular connection. 例如，屬性可以設如果用戶端要求的所有通訊進行加密。For example, the property can be set to if the client requires all communication to be encrypted. ## 屬性值Property Value 要用於這個連接中的作業的 COM 驗證等級。The COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection. 預設值是，這表示根據標準 DCOM 交涉程序的 用戶端會使用伺服器上，要求的驗證層級。The default value is , which indicates that the client will use the authentication level requested by the server, according to the standard DCOM negotiation process. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連線到遠端電腦，並顯示遠端電腦上的作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A建立連線到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication/cs/ConnectionOptions_Authentication.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication/vb/ConnectionOptions_Authentication.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Authority { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Authority : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要用來驗證指定使用者的授權。

span.span: Gets or sets the authority to be used to authenticate the specified user.

value.span: 傳回 ，這個字串會定義用於驗證指定使用者的授權。

span.span: Returns a that defines the authority used to authenticate the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性必須以下列方式傳遞： 如果它是以字串"Kerberos:"，則會使用 Kerberos 驗證，而且這個屬性應該包含 Kerberos 主體名稱。The property must be passed as follows: If it begins with the string "Kerberos:", Kerberos authentication will be used and this property should contain a Kerberos principal name. 例如，套用至物件的For example, ``` Kerberos: ``` 如果屬性值開頭為字串"NTLMDOMAIN:"，則會使用 NTLM 驗證，而且屬性應該包含的 NTLM 網域名稱。If the property value begins with the string "NTLMDOMAIN:", NTLM authentication will be used and the property should contain a NTLM domain name. 例如，套用至物件的For example, ``` NTLMDOMAIN: ``` 如果屬性為 null，則會使用 NTLM 驗證，並會使用目前使用者的 NTLM 網域。If the property is null, NTLM authentication will be used and the NTLM domain of the current user will be used. ## 屬性值Property Value 如果不是`null`，這個屬性可以包含 Windows NT/Windows 2000 網域，從中取得要驗證的使用者名稱。If not `null`, this property can contain the name of the Windows NT/Windows 2000 domain in which to obtain the user to authenticate. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連線到遠端電腦，並顯示遠端電腦上的作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A建立連線到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否需要為連接作業啟用使用者權限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.

summary.span: 在執行的作業需要啟用某些使用者權限時 (例如，電腦重新開機) 才應該使用這個屬性。

span.span: This property should only be used when the operation performed requires a certain user privilege to be enabled (for example, a machine restart).

value.span: 傳回 值，指出是否需要為連接作業啟用使用者權限。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果需要針對連接作業啟用使用者權限否則， `false`。`true` if user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation; otherwise, `false`. 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

member this.Impersonation : System.Management.ImpersonationLevel with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 COM 模擬等級，以使用於這個連接中的作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection.

value.span: 傳回 列舉值，表示用於連接 WMI 的模擬等級。

span.span: Returns an enumeration value indicating the impersonation level used to connect to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定十分有用，當您信任的應用程式或服務提供者。The setting is advantageous when the provider is a trusted application or service. 它不需要執行用戶端身分識別提供者，並存取檢查要求的作業。It eliminates the need for the provider to perform client identity and access checks for the requested operations. 不過，如果基於某些原因無法信任提供者，允許它模擬用戶端可能會構成安全性威脅。However, if for some reason the provider cannot be trusted, allowing it to impersonate the client may constitute a security threat. 在這種情況下，我們建議，此屬性設定為較低的值，用戶端這類。In such cases, we recommend that this property be set by the client to a lower value, such as . 請注意，這可能會導致失敗的提供者來執行要求的作業，了解缺乏足夠的權限或無法執行存取檢查。Note that this may cause failure of the provider to perform the requested operations, for lack of sufficient permissions or inability to perform access checks. ## 屬性值Property Value 要用於這個連接中的作業的 COM 模擬等級。The COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection. 預設值是，表示 WMI 提供者在此連線中執行所要求的作業時，可以模擬用戶端。The default value is , which indicates that the WMI provider can impersonate the client when performing the requested operations in this connection. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連線到遠端電腦，並顯示遠端電腦上的作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A建立連線到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation/cs/ConnectionOptions_Impersonation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation/vb/ConnectionOptions_Impersonation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Locale { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Locale : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於連接作業的地區設定。

span.span: Gets or sets the locale to be used for the connection operation.

value.span: 傳回 值，這個值用於連接 WMI 時所需的地區設定。

span.span: Returns a value used for the locale in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft 地區設定識別項、 字串的格式是 「 Ms_<*xxx*"，其中*xxx*十六進位格式表示的地區設定識別碼 (LCID); 例如，美式英文會是一個字串會顯示為 「 MS_409"。For Microsoft locale identifiers, the format of the string is "MS_*xxx*", where *xxx* is a string in hexadecimal form that indicates the Locale Identification (LCID); for example, American English would appear as "MS_409". ## 屬性值Property Value 預設值是 DEFAULTLOCALE。The default value is DEFAULTLOCALE. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連線到遠端電腦，並顯示遠端電腦上的作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A建立連線到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale/cs/ConnectionOptions_Locale.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale/vb/ConnectionOptions_Locale.vb#1)]

summary.span: 設定指定使用者的密碼。

span.span: Sets the password for the specified user.

value.span: 傳回 值，這個值用於連接 WMI 時所需的密碼。

span.span: Returns a value used for the password in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空白字串 ("") 指定有效的長度為零的密碼。A blank string ("") specifies a valid zero-length password. 硬式編碼密碼是一項安全性威脅。Hard-coding a password is a security threat. 使用的安全預防措施，例如加密密碼，或提示使用者輸入密碼，當您設定屬性。Use security precautions such as encrypting a password, or prompting the user for a password when you set the property. ## 屬性值Property Value 預設值是 `null`。The default value is `null`. 如果使用者名稱也是`null`，所使用的認證將是目前登入的使用者。If the user name is also `null`, the credentials used will be those of the currently logged-on user. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::SecureString ^ SecurePassword { void set(System::Security::SecureString ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定指定使用者的密碼。

span.span: Sets the password for the specified user.

value.span: 傳回 SecureString 值，這個值用於連接 WMI 時所需的密碼。

span.span: Returns a SecureString value used for the password in a connection to WMI.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Username { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Username : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於連接作業的使用者名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the user name to be used for the connection operation.

value.span: 傳回 值，這個值用於連接 WMI 時所需的使用者名稱。

span.span: Returns a value used as the user name in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用者名稱是從目前的網域以外的網域，字串可能包含反斜線分隔的使用者名稱與網域名稱： 字串 'username' ="EnterDomainHere\\\EnterUsernameHere"。If the user name is from a domain other than the current domain, the string may contain the domain name and user name, separated by a backslash: string 'username' = "EnterDomainHere\\\EnterUsernameHere". `strUser`參數不可以是空的字串。The `strUser` parameter cannot be an empty string. ## 屬性值Property Value `null` 如果連接將會使用目前登入的使用者;否則，代表使用者名稱的字串。`null` if the connection will use the currently logged-on user; otherwise, a string representing the user name. 預設值是 `null`。The default value is `null`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會連線到遠端電腦，並顯示遠端電腦上的作業系統的相關資訊。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A建立連線到遠端電腦所需的連接選項。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName/cs/ConnectionOptions_Username.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName/vb/ConnectionOptions_Username.vb#1)]
